data.name: Roblox Brightburn
data.description: A nice dark with red theme for roblox. Use with the official dark roblox theme which you can access on settings.

data.css:

@-moz-document domain("austlii.edu.au"){a,a:visited,a:link,a:active,a:focus,a:hover{color:#3796cc}body{background-color:#111 !important;background-image:none !important;color:#bbb}header{background-color:#111 !important}table td,table th{background-color:inherit !important}.card{background-color:#111 !important}.card-title{color:#bbb !important}.card li{background-color:inherit !important}#search-box{color:#111 !important}#page-content{background-color:#111 !important}#page-main,.the-document{background-color:#111 !important;padding-right:10px !important;padding-left:10px !important}.the-document ol>li{color:#bbb !important}.the-document>ul li{margin:0 !important}.the-document>h3{margin-bottom:0 !important}.the-document>ul li>a:first-child:after{content:"."}}

data.name: Tumblr multi column without space
data.description: Tumblr multi column dashboard without space between blogs.

data.name: Dark You Need A Budget
data.description: You Need A Budget is lacking a dark mode. This stylesheet enables dark mode for both YNAB and Toolkit for YNAB. The project aims to mix YNAB style with the dark theme principles from Material Design.
